hrmi.charts.dimensionIntro.esr.adjusted: 與國家收入水準可實現的生活品質相比，中國的表現如何？
hrmi.charts.dimensionIntro.physint: 中國政府在尊重各項權利的情況如何？
hrmi.charts.dimensionIntro.empowerment: 中國政府在尊重各項權利的情況如何？
hrmi.components.CountryNarrative.cpr.the: 賦權分數是2.1 分（總分10分)。分數顯⽰很多⼈沒有享受到他們該有的權利和政治⾃由（⾔論權利、集會和結社權利以及⺠主權利）。
while many people are enjoying their civil liberties and political freedoms (freedom of speech, assembly and association, and democratic rights), a significant number are not.
while most people are enjoying their civil liberties and political freedoms (freedom of speech, assembly and association, and democratic rights), some are not.
人身完整性權利分數是2.8 分（總分10分）。 分數顯示很多人的人身完整性權利受到以下一項或多項 侵犯：任意逮捕、酷刑、失蹤、處決或法外處決。
a significant number of people are not safe from one or more of the following: arbitrary arrest, torture, disappearance, execution or extrajudicial killing.
while most people are safe from government abuse, some may have experienced one or more of the following: arbitrary arrest, torture, disappearance, execution or extrajudicial killing.
hrmi.components.CountryNarrative.esr.sco: Оценка Казахстана по показателю «Права, обеспечивающие достойный уровень жизни», равна 87,8% при измерении с показателем «Скорректированный доход».
Оценка Казахстана по показателю «Права, обеспечивающие достойный уровень жизни», равна 87,8% при измерении с показателем «Скорректированный доход».
hrmi.components.CountryNarrative.compAss: 與其他東亞國家相比， 中國生活質量的表現要高於平均。 由於我們只掌握中國部分數據，所以此評分僅根 據現有的數據計算。

Compared with the small group of {referenceCount} high-income OECD countries we have civil and political rights data for, {needsArticle, select, true {the } false {}}{country} {isPlural, select, true {are} false {is}} performing
由於我們在東亞和太平洋地區沒有掌握足夠公⺠和政治權利的數據，所以在這方面不能作區域比較。 在39個樣本國家中 ，中國
人身完整性權利的得分低於平均。

hrmi.dimensions-about.esr: A collection of 5 economic and social rights.
hrmi.dimensions-about.empowerment: A collection of 3 civil and political rights that strengthen democratic empowerment.
hrmi.dimensions-about.physint: A collection of 5 civil and political rights that foster people's physical integrity.
hrmi.rights.arrest: Right to freedom from arbitrary arrest
hrmi.rights.death-penalty: Right to freedom from the death penalty
hrmi.rights.extrajud-killing: Right to freedom from extrajudicial execution
hrmi.rights.jobcond: Right to just and favourable work conditions
